infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: track it requires access to your camera to let you add pictures of your items to remember them
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: track it needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload images. Your images will not be shared without your permission
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: track it needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload images. Your images will not be shared without your permission
